means: 成为拍照对象，在照片上显得

sentence.Network_en: He tore down the girl's photograph, and crumpled it into a ball.
sentence.Network_cn: 他一把扯下那女孩的照片，将它揉成一团。

sentence.Network_en: He'd like to go on safari to photograph snakes and tigers.
sentence.Network_cn: 他想进行一次观兽旅行，拍摄一些蛇类和老虎的照片。

sentence.Network_en: Our photograph shows how the plants will turn out.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们的照片展示了植物的生长状况。

encyclopedia.content: 歌曲介绍 英国硬摇滚乐队Def Leppard（威豹乐队）演唱歌曲，收录于专辑《Pyromania》。在最伟大的100首英文歌曲中位居第96位。歌曲歌词 I洀 outa luck， outa love Gotta photograph， picture of Passion killer， you爀攀 too much You爀攀 the only one I wanna touch I see your face every time I dream On every page， every magazine So wild and free so far from me You爀攀 all I want， my fantasy Oh， look what yo

entry.def: A photograph is a picture that is made using a camera.

example.ex: He wants to take some photographs of the house...
example.tran: 他想给这幢房子拍一些照片。

example.ex: Her photograph appeared on the front page of The New York Times.
example.tran: 她的照片登在了《纽约时报》的头版上。

entry.def: When you photograph someone or something, you use a camera to obtain a picture of them.

means.word_mean: 1. a picture of a person or scene in the form of a print or transparent slide; recorded by a camera on light-sensitive material

sentences.sentence: "I photographed the scene of the accident"
"She snapped a picture of the President"

means.word_mean: 2. undergo being photographed in a certain way;

auth_sentence.content: His mother burst into tears and kissed the photograph.
auth_sentence.res_content: His mother burst into tears and kissed the photograph.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His mother burst into tears and kissed the photograph.

auth_sentence.content: The photograph that the author develops darkens only gradually.
auth_sentence.res_content: The photograph that the author develops darkens only gradually.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The photograph that the author develops darkens only gradually.

auth_sentence.content: When night falls over the photograph again, J.-J.
auth_sentence.res_content: When night falls over the photograph again, J.-J.

stems_affixes.word_buile: photo光+gen产生+ic表形容词→产生光的
photo光+gen产生+ic表形容词→产生光的
photo光+phob厌恶,恨+ia病→n.光恐怖, 恐光症
photo光+synthesis合成→光的综合→光合作用
graph写,图+ic……的→adj.绘画似的, 图解的
graph写,图+ite表名词→用来写的东西→石墨
mono一个+graph写→写一个主题→专题论文
topo地方,场所+graph图+y→用图表等的方式描述地方→地形

stems_affixes.value_cn: 亲笔签名,题名或署名于……

Sentence.sentence: You need proof of citizenship, either an old passport or a birth certificate and three photographs.
I'm just going to ask you to look at some photographs before you leave if you don't mind.
Eyewitnesses to other crimes have identified the wrong person in a police lineup or in photographs.
For instance, witnesses sometimes see photographs of several suspects before they try to identify the person they saw in a lineup of people
They can become confused by seeing many photographs or similar faces.

sentences.en: It's getting too dark to take photographs.
I wonder what she photographs like.
sentences.cn: 我不知道她在照片上是什么模样。

sentences.en: The scene photographed itself on my mind.
sentences.cn: 这一景象深印在我脑海中。

jushi.english: He is hysterical at the sight of the photograph.
jushi.chinese: 他一看到那张照片就异常激动。

jushi.english: Please keep still while I take your photograph.
jushi.chinese: 我为你拍照时请不要动。

jushi.english: I came across this photograph in the back of the drawer.
jushi.chinese: 我偶然在抽屉背后发现了这张相片。
